title: A top Premier League club enquired about Riyad Mahrez in January
text:
A top Premier League club enquired about Riyad Mahrez in January   PFA POTY 
Last season, he was the PFA Player of the Year. This time around, Riyad Mahrez is struggling to replicate that form due to Leicester’s general woes. The defending champions are a shadow of their former selves, battling relegation after last season’s fairy tale. N’Golo Kante’s departure is a big factor in that. How many other stars wish they’d left? 
Jamie Vardy turned down an opportunity to move to Arsenal. 
Mahrez was reportedly catching the eye of Barcelona. Those days seem like a distant memory. Having scored 17 goals last season, the Algerian wizard has only followed that up with three this season. He’s scored more goals in the Champions League (four), helping Leicester to the last 16. January enquiry 
Tottenham made an enquiry about Mahrez in January but were turned down flat by Leicester. The Foxes told Spurs that he wasn’t for sale at any price. That’s understandable given their current jam. 
But a summer move looks like it’s on the cards. Loading tags...
